t: Hills Bros. Coffee - Wikipedia
s: February 9, 2025 - In 1985 Nestlé bought Hills Bros. and MJB coffee companies. Hills Bros. opened a new roasting plant in Suffolk, Virginia in 1988. The San Francisco headquarters were closed in 1997, moving operations to Nestlé's U.S. headquarters in Glendale, California. Nestlé sold Hills Bros. to Sara Lee in 1999. Massimo Zanetti Beverage USA purchased the brand ...
